snippet.title: Heavy Bullets - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Available Now: http://www.heavybullets.com/

Armed with a simple yet stylish revolver and six devastatingly plump bullets, you must reset the security mainframe to restore order and reap the rewards of a job well done. To succeed in the game, players will need to move carefully and make smart use of their bullets, items, and the environment around them as rushing into new areas is the fastest way to get killed.

Follow @TerriVellmann and @DoseoneTweets on Twitter for more information.
